title: Oil Holds Five-Day Gain With Geopolitics, Inventories in Focus
description: Oil held a five-day gain as traders weighed escalating geopolitical tensions against swelling inventories.
content: Oil held a five-day gain as traders weighed escalating geopolitical tensions against swelling inventories.
